name: Goblins Cave
description:
Two Goblins decide to run away from their prison, and now they have to survive a run through the dangerous cave.
Help them both simultaneously.
To control each goblin you must use finger. One finger for top goblin, another for bottom goblin.
Tap on each goblin path to make them jump. Hold finger in place longer to jump higher. Use traps strategically. Collect coins and don't fall into oblivion! If one goblin dies you can still collect coins as a ghost. Good luck! Challenge yourself for the high score.
